pageContext.claim: “I never made a call to Russia....If I went to Wisconsin or I went to Michigan -- which I won in both of them -- I didn't call Russia for help and everyone knew it.”
pageContext.analysis: During the 2016 election, Trump publicly said: “Russia, if you're listening, I hope you're able to find the 30,000 emails that are missing." The special counsel's investigation later discovered that that same day, the Russians made their first effort to break into the servers used by Mrs. Clinton’s personal office. Trump later claimed he was joking but the special counsel's report said he directed aides to follow up and obtain Clinton's personal emails.
